name: Extreme Bikes Street Tricks 3d
description:
The most addictive Real Stunt Bike Tricks Game is easy to pick up but hard to master which will keep you in the zone for hours.

Race, jump and crash your way and other mad rivals through the amazing tracks as you master the skills and the physics of motocross in this high speed tricks adventure.

Here is your chance to step up and prove that you are the most intense and competitive biker. Are you ready for moto racing? if yes then start your dirt bike and perform amazing stunt. Welcome to real stunt bike racing game.
